mapper.select:
SELECT so.order_code,so.contract_code,ss.supplier_name,so.sales_man_name,so.contract_date,so.delivery_date,so.schedule_date, sm.material_code,spm.product_model_name,sm.material_desc,CONVERT((swo.work_order_quantity/sps.package_specification_quantity),DECIMAL(9,2)) as box,swo.work_order_quantity,swo.work_order_status, CONVERT((swo.output_quantity/sps.package_specification_quantity),DECIMAL(9,2)) AS outBox,swo.output_quantity,(swo.work_order_quantity-swo.output_quantity) as surplusBox,CONVERT(((swo.work_order_quantity-swo.output_quantity)/sps.package_specification_quantity),DECIMAL(9,2)) as surplusQty From smt_work_order swo LEFT JOIN smt_order so ON so.order_id=swo.order_id LEFT JOIN mes_order_material mom ON swo.order_id = mom.order_id AND swo.material_id=mom.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_package_specification sps ON sps.package_specification_id = mom.package_specification_id left join fantech_imes.smt_supplier ss on so.supplier_id = ss.supplier_id LEFT JOIN smt_material sm ON swo.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_tab bt on bt.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_product_model spm ON bt.product_model_id = spm.product_model_id
and ss.supplier_name like CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
and so.order_code like concat('%',#{orderCode},'%')
and so.contract_code like concat('%',#{contractCode},'%')
and so.sales_man_name like concat('%',#{salesManName},'%')
and sm.material_code like concat('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and date_format(so.delivery_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by so.order_code desc
